title: Log in not working
body:
It seems a number of NZ gamers can not log in to league of legends. We all report the same problem, the logging in loading screen just sitting there forever. Rito plz. Can one of your employees at least please respond to the number of discussions about this topic?

Additional:
so after 15 minutes of waiting now it has finally come up with a connection error. Seems it is riot that has the problem after all.
